headline: Metals & Mining outlook: Nucor remains top pick at Jefferies, CMC upgraded to Buy
summary: Investing.com -- The U.S. steel sector is heading into 2026 on firmer ground, a Jefferies analyst says, with rising free cash flow expected as prices stabilize, imports fall, and capital spending eases.
